channel.title: hardware on [::1] yearl.us
channel.description: Recent content in hardware on [::1] yearl.us

item.title: Openmediavault 4 server... PSU died
item.description: Oh, the sadness. Oh, the heartbreak. Never mind, stiff upper lip and all that, and remembering that I got the thing from the dump (sans disk and RAM) over a 18 months ago, it has not had a bad run. Aaand just in case I come across a PSU and get her running again, she was: Old OMV4 box DELL Inspiron 545 Serial: 839DK4J Model: DCMF Reg Type: 09040 Printed on mobo: DG33M06 SE0709

item.title: External USB 3 drive woes
item.description: External HFS + USB drive could not be found HFS. Disk Utility, Disk Warrior and Drive Genius could not repair or rebuild the drive. Tried to reformat under Disk Utility, but the “drive could not be unmounted”. Disk Warrior and Drive Genius could not reformat either. Drive was recognised as “Untitled” at /media/Untitled under Ubuntu 12 [cc_bash]sudo blkid[/cc] reveals “Untitled” to be [cc inline=“true”]/dev/sdb2[/cc]
